channel.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
channel.description: I will probably be buying Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Pack later today. anyone else getting anything?

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
Misery 2.0 is out in a couple of days, that’s worth checking out. Basically makes the game a lot more gritty, realistic and terrifying.

https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-misery

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On

item.description:

Should I get dishonered, borderlands 2 and tomb raider for $30 or bioshock infinite? Actually never played bioshock before and never played borderlands.

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Pyro:

Come to think of it, I also have Darksiders and Titan Quest and haven’t touched them either. Any of these games any good?

Darksiders is pretty good. You might want to play it with a controller if the keyboard and mouse controls don’t suit you.

Titan Quest is good - if you get the expansion pack Immortal Throne it becomes much better.

I got Saint’s Row: The Third from the Humble THQ Bundle and haven’t really played it either

Read full topic

Well I just bought six games, only two of which I have played so far. I also have another six or ten on bcklog that I don’t know when I will get to them. Bleh…

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Public Service Announcement: I just figured out that you get a Steam Summer Getaway trading card for every three votes you cast in the community choice sales. So if you’re into the cards, try to cast a vote in every community choice sale - they cycle every eight hours.

I got 3 of the same card in a row (‘Prison Architect’) :meh:

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Pyro:

Opposing Force did that too. More than one area was lifted straight from HL1… So I guess what they say about it setting the standard for expansion packs is true.

Actually, when I said copy-pasted, I meant as in they took part of the level you are in and copy-pasted the same area over and over in several different spots in the same level :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Public Service Announcement: I just figured out that you get a Steam Summer Getaway trading card for every three votes you cast in the community choice sales. So if you’re into the cards, try to cast a vote in every community choice sale - they cycle every eight hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Summer Sale Is On
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Bloodshot:

I was more talking about the level design. I recently looked at it again and for several places I immediately noticed pretty terrible brushwork compared to the original game, and they blatantly copy pasted some areas several times over.

Opposing Force did that too. More than one area was lifted straight from HL1… So I guess what they say about it setting the standard for expansion packs is true.

Read full topic
